message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer is fair and gives us both a good deal.
I understand you want a larger share Alice, but this split is more reflective of the decreasing value over time.  Let's close this out and both benefit.
Bob, we're running out of time. I need you to meet me closer to the middle on this.
Alice, time is running out, and the value is decreasing rapidly. This offer is a good compromise - let's settle this now.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but I need you to move a little. This is my final offer.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. The value is plummeting with each round.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point.
